job description:
Business Analyst/Data Analyst

Global Financial Firm

Weehawken, NJ

Long term contract

The role is a Business Analyst/Data Analyst supporting multiple projects (e.g., CAT, PB) as part of the strategic Data Governance and Data Architecture implementation.

Responsibilities:

? Proactively identify and document requirements from data owners and other key business stakeholders

? Profile and analyze enterprise data to develop insights and enable requirements gathering

? Translate business requirements into written documentation (including business requirements, functional requirements, data flows, and process diagrams)

? Gather information to develop domain data dictionaries and define standards and rules to ensure enterprise data is compliant with defined quality requirements within their assigned domain

? Establish relationships with key business and IT stakeholders to validate and approve data requirements and business rules

? Perform in depth analysis of the data quality issues to facilitate their remediation, define rules and controls to proactively monitor the quality of data

? Define test cases, perform the user acceptance testing liaising with the test manager , QA and development throughout the release process

Role requirements:

? Business analysis and data wrangling (transforming and mapping) experience

? Solid knowledge of data management principles and processes

? Hands on knowledge of data analysis, data profiling with SQL, IDQ or any other tools

? Experience with data root cause analysis and cross functional resolution of data issues

? Ability to break down complex problems into components, identify root causes, and establish resolution plans

? 5+ years of data analyst experience

? Proficient in Microsoft Excel, PowerPoint, Word

? Ability to effectively communicate complex concepts

? Ability to adapt to change and to detect and respond to evolving business needs

? Analytical and logical

? Highly motivated self-starter with ability to work independently and creatively as well as within a team

? Team player, collaborative and inclusive
